data.text: Gooɠaaʋote pagɔi ɠa ɗa ziiɠulagi ɠaayei,
Zɔi é kalagi wosu ga ɠimalai, toɠa ɗa kala wɔin ɠɛ nu ma,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuʋɛ ɠa adaʋɛ pɛ,
Nu laawoo ʋagɔiti kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ zɛnvu wulu wolai,
Ɠimalala nui ɠa ɗa kɛɛɠɛ ná-tɛnɛ gooiti pɛlɛʋɛlɛ,
Naavolo mɔinmɔin ka é telebo nui ná-pɛlɛi wu,
Ɠima nuiti daawooi ɠa ɗa faaɠwɛgi vaza,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maaɲɛɛi ɠa ga faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-zalaɠaiti,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maaɲɛɛi ɠa ga faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ziɛ ʋelei,
Zɔi é zeɠezu faa ʋagɔi ʋolu, faa wola ɠa la ma ga maaɠolo,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI gɔvɛalaazu ta undaaʋili zeɠezaɠai, zu vaiti kpein kwɛɛ,
Waso nui nɛɛbɛ vaa la ga nu zelii lo ma,
Koozunɛɛi ɠa ɗa nu ɠaazuʋɛ volo,
Keleɠele nui ɠa ɗa ɠaaɓa faa maaɠɔli vai ma yeenɔpɛ,
Maanɔɠɔ nui zii ma voloi kpein ɲɔuʋɛ,
Fizɔgɛ nu ɗa ani go nɔ zɔlɔɔ, è ɠɛ ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluaba nu,
Fizɔgɛ nu tufa wuulugi ma laamii wo, kpɛtɛai nɛɛbɛi zu,
Ziiɠula nui ɠa ɗa kpɔɛiti suwɔɔlɔ,
Ɲaka nui ná-pelei ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ ɠain sasai,
Ɠima loun zunui ɠa ɗa kɛɛɠɛ ɠoozunɛ,
Ɠimalalai ɠa ga koozunɛɛi naama nui ʋɛ, nii balagai faaɠaaɠai ma,
Faa mɔinmɔin ka ɗa ɠazaʋi, ti la zolooga tɔɔzei gaazaɠatalai ʋa,
Koozunɛ vaa ʋe zunui ʋɛ, siɛgi zu é ɓɔɠɔ wooɠaaʋotegi veezu la,
Keleɠele nui ɠa ɗa ziɛ ga pelei, nii é lɛɛzu geezuʋɛ zɛnvui ʋɔ bɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa waso nuiti ta-ʋɛlɛi ɠoloɠolo,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maaɲɛɛi ɠa ga kisiɛ ɲɔiti,
Zɔi é wɔinni ʋele-o-ʋele, é ɓɛtɛ, toɠa ɗa ná-pɛlɛyeɠei lɔ kpɔlɔi zu,
Telebo nui ɠa ɗa ɠigaiziɛ, aisa é ʋa gooɠaaʋotegi ve,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maaɠoozaʋɛ faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ba,
Nuɓɔɠɔlai ma ɠaazuʋɛ ɠa ɗa koozunɛɛi ve,
Zɔi é woilosu tɛnɛ gooiti ma, ta ɓɔ ba etea ziɛi zu,
Zɔi é ɠɛlɛzu ga zelii mina lo ma, naa ɠa ɓɔɠɔ ʋɛlɛʋɛlɛsu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai ɠa ɗa nu ɠala ga ɠimalai,
